entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CS8602 (dereference of a possible null reference) when using method group, but not when using lambda #57753
  • Invalid parsing of interpolated strings with curly braces followed after interpolation with format specifier #57750
  • IDE0059 and code fix for use discard but instead (correctly) simplifies to type match #57748
  • IDE 0044 and IDE 1006 making private static field PascalCase #57747
  • Show dialog when an item can't be edited because of source control #57746
  • Obsolete diagnostic not reported on System.Index or System.Range #57745

Closed

  • Gold bar with exception in VisualStudioWorkspaceImpl.EnsureEditableDocuments when renaming a type (with rename file) #45031
    17.1

PullRequests

Created

  • Add test from PR 50799 for impl PR 56853 #57752
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Fix curly brace and interpolated string #57751
    Area-Compilers, Community

Updated

  • Merge main to features/vs2022-theme #57756
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/snappy/nodelay #57755
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge main to features/list-patterns #57754
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Ignore function types in return type inference #57713
    Area-Compilers, 17.0
  • Address some PROTOTYPE markers #57318
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - List Patterns
  • Synthesize delegate types for lambdas with parameter types or return type that are not valid type arguments #57295
    Area-Compilers
  • Make it possible to analyze the dataflow of `ConstructorInitializerSyntax ` #57576
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Update corefx dependencies to 6.0.0 #57732
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Enable dumps for hung tests #57549
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Adjust tests for Windows 11 changes #57678
    Area-Compilers
